description: Kate Crawford's Atlas of AI argues that mining and extraction ground the tech industry. Examples range from venture capital to e-waste lakes. Space is the next frontier for this exploitation. With the decline of this model and rising issues like climate change, ecosystem architecture merges decentralization and regenerative design to propose a future of renewal over unsustainable innovation.
excerpt: Kate Crawford's Atlas of AI highlights the tech industry's reliance on extraction and depletion. Ecosystem architecture combines decentralization and regenerative design for sustainable innovation.
